content.raw:
I know the plan so far is to only support hydro (http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/ReleaseSchedule). Given the significantly changed competition schedule (adding 6 months), a switch to newer OS and ROS versions seems desirable for various reasons (of course, there also various good reasons not to switch).
Team ViGIR would be very interested in upgrading to 14.04/ROS Indigo. In fact, drcsim is the last remaining roadblock that prevents us from doing so. Any hints on how to best do so are appreciated (building Gazebo/drcsim in our catkin workspace/building them in a separate workspace etc.).
